General.Description: CFI-Compagnie Foncière Internationale, a real estate investment company, engages in leasing land and other property assets. The company was formerly known as Didot-Bottin and changed its name on December 9, 2008. As of December 31, 2009, its real estate portfolio comprised 12 assets located in France. CFI-Compagnie Foncière Internationale was founded in 1796 and is based in Paris, France.
General.Address: 72 Rue du Faubourg Saint Honoré, Paris, France, 75008
